data.title: Funko Games
data.meta_description: Funko Games embraces the ideals of invention, design and playtesting to bring you games that delight, entertain and inspire
data.text:
Funko and Goliath Announce Exclusive Global Deal for Funko Games

EVERETT, Wash. and HATTEM, Netherlands — January 17, 2024 — Funko, Inc. (Nasdaq: FNKO), a leading pop culture lifestyle brand, and Goliath, a private family owned and run global game company, today announced that the companies have entered into an exclusive worldwide license and...

Five Nights at Freddy’s FightLine Game Night Events at GameStop – Join the Fun!

Hey there, Five Nights at Freddy’s fans! We’ve got some electrifying news – Funko Games has teamed up with GameStop to bring you the ultimate “Five Nights at Freddy’s FightLine Game Night” event on October 13th! What’s the Deal: Get ready to dive into the...

Cranium 25th anniversary edition Starbucks Game Events Promotion Revealed

Calling all board gamers and coffee lovers! Funko Games is proud to partner with Starbucks in Game Events happening at select participating Starbucks stores across the country to showcase their Cranium 25th Anniversary Edition board game. Come sketch, sculpt and hum your way through Cranium...

Funko Games Announces 2023 Holiday Game Lineup

Ahead of Toy Fair, Funko Games, the award-winning tabletop gaming studio, presents a collection of engaging board and party games inspired by beloved holiday classics, including iconic properties and characters like Charlie Brown, Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer, Rugrats, Disney’s Winnie The Pooh, and Disney’s The...

Funko Games Earns Toy of The Year Nominations For Fifth Year In a Row

Disney Animated and Cranium Big Brain: Detective Game Received Nominations for Game of the Year and STEAM Game of the Year Respectively Today, the Toy Association announced that innovative tabletop games developer Funko Games earned Toy of The Year (TOTY) Award nominations for two of...

UNLEASH THE ANIMATRONIC CHAOS WITH FUNKO GAMES’ FIVE NIGHTS AT FREDDY’S FIGHTLINE

Inspired by Popular Horror Franchise, Five Nights at Freddy’s, The Thrilling New Game Features a Premier Set and Character Packs Available This October Ahead of GameSpot Expo, Funko Games recently announced their all-new collectible battle board game, Five Nights at Freddy’s Fightline. Arriving this...

Funko Games at Gen Con 2023

Funko Games is back at Gen Con! Super excited to be returning to Indy this year, so check out all the details on where to find us and what we are doing. WHERE ARE WE? Once again, Funko Games will have two locations at Gen...

Funko Games Debuts Star Trek™ Cryptic and Scream The Game

Leading Tabletop Game Developer Also Reveals Original NUCK TATS and Contemporary Refresh of ‘90’s Strategy Hit Big Boss. WHAT: Ahead of GAMA EXPO, Funko Games unveiled four captivating new board and party games. The leading tabletop games developer announced today that the new games will...

Funko Games, in collaboration with Lucasfilm, Brings the Adventure Home with New Tabletop Games Inspired by Indiana Jones

From Puzzling Mysteries to Fast-Paced Strategy, the Four Releases Offer Something for Every Indiana Jones Fan (SEATTLE, Wash) (April 10, 2023) – Funko Games today unveiled four brand-new games inspired by the world of Indiana Jones, three of which hit shelves today, April 10. The...

Funko Games Announces the Star Wars Rivals Card Game, an All-New Collectible and Expandable Game Experience

Light and Dark Sides Clash in a Battle for Control Across the Star Wars Galaxy, Featuring Endless Layers of Strategy and Fun; Premier Set and Expansive Character Booster Packs Available Late Spring 2023 (SEATTLE, Wash) (April 4, 2023) – Funko Games today announced the Star...

Funko Games Unveils New Slate of Disney Board Games Arriving in Spring 2023

The Highly Anticipated Family Games include Disney Animated, Disney Sinister Spoons, Disney and Pixar’s Cars Launch ‘N’ Race, Pop! Puzzles and More Funko Games revealed a new wave of Disney board games including the all-new original Disney Animated, Disney Villains Sinister Spoons and Disney and...

Funko Games Expands Presence in Oceania, Partners with Big Wheel Toys and Let’s Play Games

Funko Games Expands Presence in Australia and New Zealand Acclaimed Studio Announces Partnerships with Oceania-Based Distributors Seattle (January 31, 2023) – Funko Games, today, announced its expansion in Australia and New Zealand with distribution partners Big Wheel Toys and Let’s Play Games. These partnerships are...

Funko Games and Hasbro Unveil Reimagined Legendary Party Game – Cranium 25th Anniversary Edition

Biggest Names in Board Games Sign Multi-Year Partnership to Introduce the Magic of Cranium Games to New Audience of Millennials and their Young Families London Toy Fair (January 23, 2023) – Hasbro, a global branded entertainment leader, and Funko Games today announced a new multi-year...

Venomize Your Favorite Heroes in New Marvel Battleworld Series From Funko Games

We are Venom! Everyone’s favorite anti-hero has arrived to lead the newest installment of the collectible adventure game Marvel Battleworld from Funko Games. The just-announced Marvel Battleworld Series 4 – Rise of the Symbiotes comes on the heels of the successful release of Series 3 – Ultimate Armory earlier this year. In this...

Funko Games Unveils New Line of Pop!-Inspired Puzzles

Today, Funko Games unveiled a new line of Pop!-inspired puzzles, just in time for holiday. Featuring Funko’s iconic Pop! style, the first three puzzles feature Elf, Avatar: The Last Airbender, and Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. “The Funko Pop! is legendary – with millions of fans and millions of Pop!...

Funko Games “Toy of the Year” Finalists

Whether this year’s holiday list needs an extra stocking stuffer for the Disney lover or epically sized gift for the Jurassic fan, the just-announced Toy of the Year (TOTY) finalists have something for everyone, including two of the most talked about games from Funko Games in 2022—Disney Kingdomania and Jurassic World:...

Funko Games Ushers in Halloween with New Games

Whether revelers choose to take on the role of the iconic animatronics at Freddy Fazbear’s Pizza, accept their invitation to join the Squid Game, or devise a plan to capture the Sanderson Sisters’ spell book, the concoctions from the Funko Games cauldron are sure to delight—or fright—this...

Get Ready to Play as Your Favorite Disney, Pixar Characters in New, Expandable Game – Disney Kingdomania from Funko Games

Funko Games invites players to help their favorite Disney and Pixar characters save a world of adorable chaos in their new expandable game, Disney Kingdomania. Stylized after classic pixelated games and designed with Funko’s iconic collectability in mind, Disney Kingdomania is the first game to combine the thrill of blind...

Celebrate 40 years of E.T. and Other Summer Blockbusters with Funko Games

It’s been 40 years since the gentle E.T. first became stranded on Earth. To celebrate, Funko Games is bringing this classic tale to the tabletop just in time for summer and is available today. In E.T. The Extra-Terrestrial: Light Years from Home Game, now available exclusively at Target, players...

Rear Window – Based on the Iconic 1954 Alfred Hitchcock Nail-Biter Coming this Summer

A board game of deduction and mystery inspired by the “Master of Suspense” The quintessential nail-biting, edge-of-your-seat Alfred Hitchcock thriller has been transformed into Rear Window Game – coming to a tabletop this summer from Funko Games’ acclaimed design studio Prospero Hall. One player assumes...

Bring home CoComelon fun with new games from Funko Games in 2022!

Let’s play a game, look at where we are. Won’t you look at me and tell me what you see? The singalong world of JJ and his friends comes to life with two new preschool games from Funko Games in 2022! Based on the top...

Funko Games Reveals Two New Preschool Games Inspired by Dr. Seuss

There’s fun to be done! There are points to be scored. There are games to be won. Funko Games, creators of the award-winning Dr. Seuss’ Happy Birthday to You Game and Dr. Seuss Stack the Cat Game, travels back into the amazing world of...

Funko Games Brings Must See TV to Game Night

Treat yo’self to a pair of new party games from Funko Games! Inspired by critically acclaimed workplace comedies “Ted Lasso” and “Parks and Recreation,” the just-announced games place players in the role of their favorite characters, while bringing adored stories to life – putting the...

New Disney-Inspired Games for Kids & Families

Bippidi-boppidi-boo – a game for you and you and YOU! In one magic moment, Funko Games reveals seven new Disney-inspired board games for fans of all ages. The 2022 Disney lineup includes: Games that celebrate the 50th Anniversary of Walt Disney World with Disney Happiest Day...

Funko Games Unveils Marvel Battleworld: Series 3 Ultimate Armory

The Hit Collectible Adventure Game from Funko Games Follows the Marvel Multiverse into the Armor Wars & is One of Dozens of New and Entertaining Games Debuting in 2022 Funko Games unveils Marvel Battleworld: Series 3 Ultimate Armory, the next in the wildly popular collectible adventure game...

Funko Games celebrates Walt Disney World’s 50th Anniversary with new Special Edition Haunted Mansion Game

Welcome, foolish mortals, to The Haunted Mansion. Step inside one of Disney Parks’s most beloved and spooky attractions as Funko Games kicks off its celebration of Walt Disney World’s golden anniversary. Disney The Haunted Mansion – Call of the Spirits Game: Magic Kingdom Park Edition...

Prospero Hall Reveals Details of Jurassic World: The Legacy of Isla Nublar

With more than 24 hours of thrilling customizable adventures, Jurassic World: The Legacy of Isla Nublar will be coming to Kickstarter in March 2022 “Life finds a way,” and so does the passionate team at Prospero Hall, the acclaimed development studio of Funko Games, who...

Merry Grinchmas! from Funko Games

Inspired by the holiday title How the Grinch Stole Christmas, Funko Games brings this classic tale to life in two new games, destined to become a new family tradition (queue the movie, add cocoa). Set in Who-ville, Dr. Seuss Merry Grinchmas (under $20) is equal...

The Warriors: Come Out to Play Plus Jurassic World Legacy!

Funko Games Celebrates Pop Culture Through the Decades at Gen Con Indy The Warriors: Come Out to Play, Based on the ‘70s Cult Classic, Gets Rowdy With a New Cooperative Game Funko Games Also Teases Jurassic World – The First-Ever Legacy Game Based on a...

Funko Games at Gen Con Indy 2021

Funko Games is rocking Gen Con Indy in a big way this year! We made our convention debut at Gen Con 2019 with the launch of Funkoverse, and now we are returning home to The Best Four Days of Gaming, celebrating our Funactics and welcoming...

Celebrate Halloween with spooky new games for boys, girls, and ghouls from Funko Games!

Sweets? Check. Costumes? Check. Games that will make this Halloween the most fun? CHECK! Funko Games has seven games just in time for the scary season, bringing the family together over stories from Tim Burton’s The Nightmare Before Christmas, Disney’s The Haunted Mansion, Funko’s Boo...

Soar High Above the City of Angels with The Rocketeer: Fate of the Future

Funko Games invites you to travel back in time with – an immersive two-player strategy game by acclaimed studio Prospero Hall, evoking a stunning art deco-style design. Inspired by the 1991 Disney adventure movie, The Rocketeer transports players into the golden age of Hollywood. Opponents...

Mikey, Mouth, Chunk, Data, and Sloth Are Coming to Save the Day!

Hey you guys! This summer, you can relive the ‘80s with The Goonies: Never Say Die! In this new adventure game – an astounding tale of treasure and peril – one player is the Goondocks Master guiding the story through nine unique adventures, while the...

Marvel Battleworld Unleashes Treachery at Twilight

The villainous Thanos continues to wreak havoc, trapping the greatest heroes of the Marvel universe in the all-new Marvel Battleworld: Treachery at Twilight. Compatible with the original collectible game introduced last year, Treachery at Twilight will introduce Loki’s devious Tick cards, which adds new gameplay...

Balance the cosmos with Funkoverse: MARVEL!

Marvel’s Infinity War explodes into the Funkoverse in an epic board game showdown between The Avengers and the full might of Thanos. Captain America, Iron Man, Black Panther and Black Widow face off against Thanos himself. Two epic new editions arrive with Funkoverse: Marvel 100...

Get Ready for Fast & Furious: Highway Heist!

Just revealed today, the first Prospero Hall title of 2021, Fast & Furious: Highway Heist races to your table this year! More Info

Funkoverse: Darkwing Duck Coming Soon!

The terror that flaps in the night will soon be swinging his way into the Funkoverse! Announced today by Funko, this Spring Convention exclusive will be released as part as Funko Virtual Con. Official online retail partner information coming soon! Game Information

New Battleworld Mega Pack!

Frost Giant Loki joins Marvel Battleworld exclusively in a brand-new Mega Pack. Mega Packs include 6 characters – four starting Heroes, including an exclusive Frost Giant Loki with foil character card, and two more heroes trapped in Thanostones! Click here for more info!

Announcing Groundhog Day The Game!

“It’s Groundhog Day, again!” says cynical weatherman Phil Connors, as he endures February 2nd over and over. Relive Phil’s day round after round in this clever cooperative card game. Choose strategically how to react to the same obnoxious townsfolk and events as you get better...

Hello World!

Welcome to FunkoGames.com! This is your go-to hub for all information about our games. Here you will find a full list of titles, instructions, updates, FAQs, retailer information, and news about our new releases!
